desc: Little Local Box showcases ethical and eco-conscious UK artisans by region. Our curated gift boxes are perfect for all occasions from birthdays to corporate gifts. Our low / zero plastic collections offer a conscious, sustainable and eco-friendly way to gift whilst supporting small local businesses.

layout.text: Eco-friendly, sustainable and ethical gift boxes by region

Carefully curated from conscious British businesses in the UK
Curated with conscience | Gifted with love | Received with delight
